FedUp

In partnership with the Missouri ACLU.

Explaining the issue with our justice system

Take a look around your social media and the issues are evident: the process is outdated, our enforcers are unaccountable.

Thats why we’re building FedUp: a social network for social justice.

Through community sharing of injustice in our communities, we aim to empower those overlooked by the system, and to give a voice to the voiceless.   Join us.

Tell your story to people who care

Built by the People for the People

We are building the only social network on the web optimized for social justice.

Share social injustice in your community through video, text, or external link submissions  Embed content from other social networks .

Join Us

We can’t do this alone. We need passionate citizens willing to try our technology.  If you are eager to join our cause, or if you have a case you would like to submit, please contact us and we’ll be in touch soon.

Visit FedUp.com

Contact Us

Feel free to email us to provide some feedback on our mission, give us suggestions for new approaches, or to just say hello!

feedback@fedup.com
